text: Nitish Jain (born 15 February 1961) is an Indian educationist, philanthropist, and President of S P Jain School of Global Management (S P Jain), a global business school that has campuses in Dubai, Singapore, Sydney and Mumbai. and developing a proprietorial software for the delivery of online education. ==References== ==Other websites== * S P Jain School of Global Management - Dubai, Mumbai, Singapore & Sydney * Mr Nitish Jain discussing - Assessing the Value of an MBA with Bloomberg * * * Game Changer Forbes Middle East Category:Businesspeople from Mumbai Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:S P Jain School of Global Management
title: Nitish Jain
